title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: Master front-end and back-end development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and become a full-stack developer.

title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Learn penetration testing, network security, cryptography, and ethical hacking techniques to protect systems from cyber threats.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS & Azure
description: Understand cloud infrastructure, deployment models, serverless computing, and security best practices using AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

title: Data Science & Machine Learning
description: Gain hands-on experience in data analysis, machine learning, Python, TensorFlow, and artificial intelligence with real-world projects.

title: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
description: Learn user research, wireframing, Figma, Adobe XD, and design thinking principles to create intuitive user interfaces.

title: DevOps & CI/CD Pipelines
description: Master Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, and CI/CD automation techniques to streamline software deployment processes.

title: Python Programming
description: Learn Python from basics to advanced topics, including data structures, OOP, web development with Flask/Django, and automation.

title: Java Programming
description: Master Java programming with object-oriented concepts, data structures, Spring Boot, and enterprise application development.

title: JavaScript & Modern Frameworks
description: Deep dive into JavaScript ES6+, React, Angular, Vue.js, and backend development with Node.js.

title: C & C++ Programming
description: Learn C and C++ programming with data structures, memory management, game development, and competitive programming techniques.

title: Artificial Intelligence & Deep Learning
description: Explore neural networks, deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and AI-powered applications using Python and TensorFlow.

title: Android App Development
description: Build mobile applications using Java/Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, and publish them on the Google Play Store.

title: iOS App Development
description: Develop iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI, integrating Apple APIs and best UI/UX practices.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain, smart contracts, Ethereum, and developing decentralized applications (DApps).

title: Game Development with Unity
description: Create interactive games using Unity and C#, covering 2D/3D game physics, AI, and multiplayer networking.

title: Big Data & Hadoop
description: Understand big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, and data lakes to process massive datasets efficiently.

title: SQL & Database Management
description: Master SQL queries, relational database management, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and NoSQL databases like MongoDB.

title: Networking & System Administration
description: Learn network configuration, system security, Linux administration, and server management techniques.
